elements.label: Relentless Cold
elements.description: Frost prohibits the way. Machines may fail, and men may freeze to death.

elements.label: Furious Storms
elements.description: Thunder stalks the lightning through the clouds. Rain pounds like artillery-fire.

elements.label: Obscuring Fog
elements.description: Sight and mobility are limited. It would be easy to walk into an ambush, or for a nasty fall to go misjudged.

elements.label: Shadowed Forest
elements.description: Legions of trees stand upright and unmoving in the gloom. No easy road presents itself.

elements.label: A Miasma
elements.description: A poisonous haze thickens the air, choking the lungs and burning the skin.

elements.label: Enemy Fortifications
elements.description: Minefields, caltrops, steel baricades. We will need to dismantle these defenses, or find a viable path through them.

elements.label: Treacherous Terrain
elements.description: Crags and shell-craters scar the land. Perception and caution will allow us to pass safely; fire and ingenuity will allow us to clear a path through these ruins.

elements.label: An Earthquake!
elements.description: The earth lies not dead, but sleeping.

elements.label: A Nocturnal Influence
elements.description: A shadow on the spirit, a disease of the soul, a knot of petrifying darkness.

elements.label: An Apollonian Influence
elements.description: This is the sort of light that scours the soul. Come and see, come and see -

elements.label: A Dionysian Influence
elements.description: The wilding-waste, the green-sickness that grows in the forest beneath the world - the Wood! The Wood! The Wood!

elements.label: Scarlet Temptations
elements.description: The eyes swim red. The mouth waters. Starving - all of a sudden, we are starving. If we give in to these insidious hungers, we may turn upon one another, devouring.

elements.label: The Colonel's Severity
elements.description: The Colonel's unseeing eyes scour the battlefield today. This power is only the lingering chill of his animosity, but it is enough to freeze screams in the throat and silence even the boldest man with dread.

elements.label: The Lionsmith's Wrath
elements.description: The Lionsmith's proud brow scrutinizes the battlefield today. This power is only a passing ember of his animosity, but it is enough to ignite fires in the flesh and drive even the bravest man from the field.

elements.label: The Wolf-Divided's Hatred
elements.description: The Wolf-Divided walked here. His hatred lingers in the world, much like how the stench of a carcass lingers long after it has been dragged away. Even this mere echo of his enmity is a force that can unmake a man.

elements.label: Worms in the World
elements.description: Here the world's skin is rotted to nothing. Things have crawled in through the wound.

elements.label: An Unknown Location
elements.description: Our goal is somewhere around here, but 'here' is a very broad word. Narrow the search.

elements.label: A Reinforced Door
elements.description: A heavy steel door bars the way. It is almost comforting how normal that is.

elements.label: Obstructing Debris
elements.description: The way forward is blocked by collapsed masonry and rubble. We could blow the path clear with the proper tools, or painstakingly set about clearing what we can by hand.

elements.label: A Hidden Passage
elements.description: There is no point of entry visible here, but that does not mean one does not exist. Teasing it out will call for keen eyes.

elements.label: Disjunctive Space
elements.description: Under the strange moon, up is sometimes down, and forward doesn't always lead ahead. The Meniscate's making trouble for us.

elements.label: A Sealing-Spell
elements.description: A dizzying knot of immutable magics prevents entry. We will need a great power of both unseaming and purification to clear the way.

elements.label: The Fallen Star
elements.description: A furious fire from heaven, thrown down to earth by the stroke of the Lionsmith's hammer. Angry would be an understatement.

elements.label: The Heart of a Star
elements.description: The star is dying, now; its light flickers red. But still, I must do one more thing: I must take its heart in my hand, rip it free, and devour it. Trying to do this might turn me to ash. Still, I will try.

elements.label: Hyphae Robigoia
elements.description: Who's there? Lacombe? Lee? Please, help me. It's getting harder to breathe... it's so dark. Dark.
